name: Holo Theme for Firefox [Linux/Firefox 11+]
description: For use with ~tiheum's awesome Holo theme for GNOME Shell and GTK3 In short Holo Theme for Firefox is a custom Stylish style that applies the Holo styled scrollbars and some of the UI elements to your Firefox for best consistency with the theme. Usage Apply this style onto the stock theme with Tabs on Bottom. Will NOT work with other options. Notes To enable the Toolbar Gear Firefox button style you need to use the addon Movable Firefox Button and move it to toolbar. Default is not to style it. Also, a few elements are not yet styled with current release, since I think it looks just fine now. Might as well add them in later updates.
